newsitem.title: USA: World Access buys Cellular Infrastructure.
newsitem.headline: World Access buys Cellular Infrastructure.

text.p: World Access Inc said on Tuesday it completed its acquisition of Cellular Infrastructure Supply Inc for $7.1 million in cash and stock.
World Access said the acquisition should be highly accretive to its earnings per share and net cash flow beginning in 1997.
Cellular's three principals and their staff will continue to manage the company as a wholly owned subsidiary of World Access.
Cellular provides equipment and support services for the cellular and other wireless service industries.
World Access makes wireline and wireless switching, transmission and access products.
